name: MKMapItem
desc: A point of interest on the map.

items.name: class func forCurrentLocation() -> MKMapItem
items.desc: Creates and returns a singleton map item object representing the device’s current location.

items.name: init(placemark: MKPlacemark)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a map item object using the specified placemark object.

items.name: var placemark: MKPlacemark
items.desc: The placemark object containing the location information.

items.name: var pointOfInterestCategory: MKPointOfInterestCategory?
items.desc: The point of interest category for the map item.

items.name: var isCurrentLocation: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the map item represents the user’s current location.

items.name: var name: String?
items.desc: The descriptive name associated with the map item.

items.name: var phoneNumber: String?
items.desc: The phone number associated with a business at the specified location.

items.name: var url: URL?
items.desc: The URL associated with the specified location.

items.name: var timeZone: TimeZone?
items.desc: The time zone of the specified location.

items.name: class func openMaps(with: [MKMapItem], launchOptions: [String : Any]?) -> Bool
items.desc: Open the Maps app and display the specified map items.

items.name: class func openMaps(with: [MKMapItem], launchOptions: [String : Any]?, from: UIScene?, completionHandler: ((Bool) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Opens the Maps app from a particular scene using the specified map items and options.

items.name: func openInMaps(launchOptions: [String : Any]?) -> Bool
items.desc: Open the Maps app and display this map item.

items.name: func openInMaps(launchOptions: [String : Any]?, from: UIScene?, completionHandler: ((Bool) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Opens the Maps app from a particular scene using the specified options.

items.name: let MKMapItemTypeIdentifier: String
items.desc: A constant indicating the type of a serialized map item.
